thread.section_title: News24, South Africa's premier news source, provides breaking news on national, world, Africa, sport, entertainment, technology & more.
thread.title: Taxis

author: news24.com
title: Taxis
text:
I know taxi's are a essential service Some drive like lunatics.
Like bats out o f hell.
They have no road rules.. They do their own thing.
Reverse in the middle of the road. Drive so fast. I had the pleasure of nearly being run over by one this morning on the way to work. I was walking innocently on the pavement.
It is not safe to walk on the pavement anymore My question is what is going to be done about this serious issue. Iam not the only one affected. They are frequently in accidents. Iam not surprised. Please think of the pedestrians. As well as your passengers
Gail Shorkend
